name: Gitleaks
description: Scan git repos (or files) for secrets using regex and entropy.
author: Joost Voskuil (joost@foxhole.nl)

inputs.name: scanfolder
inputs.label: Scan Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the location to scan. Defaults to your sources directory.

inputs.name: nogit
inputs.label: No Git
inputs.helpMarkDown: Treat git repos as plain directories.

inputs.name: configtype
inputs.label: Configuration Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify if you want to use the default, predefined config or a custom config.

inputs.name: scanonlychanges
inputs.label: Scan only changes since last build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will fetch the commits since last succesful build from the Azure DevOps Api.

inputs.name: depth
inputs.label: Number of commits to scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Limit the number of commits to scan.

inputs.name: redact
inputs.label: Redact
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option if you want to redact secrets from log messages and leaks.

inputs.name: taskfail
inputs.label: Fail the task if secrets are found.

inputs.name: uploadresults
inputs.label: Upload results
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option if you want to upload the results as an artifact.

inputs.name: reportformat
inputs.label: Report format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a report format: json, sarif, csv (default: json)

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.label: Verbose output
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option if you want gitleaks to print verbose output.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Gitleaks version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the version of Gitleaks to use.

inputs.name: customtoollocation
inputs.label: Gitleaks custom tool location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the custom directory of Gitleaks, when provided, Gitleaks will not be downloaded.

messages.ThanksToZacharyRice: Thanks to Zachary Rice (https://github.com/zricethezav) for creating and maintaining gitleaks.
messages.ThanksToJesseHouwing: Thanks to Jesse Houwing (https://github.com/jessehouwing) for providing a gitleaks config that has most of Microsoft's deprecated credscan rules ported to it.

messages.OsArchNotSupported: OS '%s' and architecture '%s' is not supported by %s.
messages.NoToolcacheDownloading: %s is not available in toolcache. Downloading %s from %s
messages.GettingUrl: Getting %s to find latest version of %s
messages.DetectedChanges: Detected %s Git changes for this build.
